拘.definition: to capture; to restrain; to constrain; to adhere rigidly to; inflexible

拘守.definition: to hold tight; to cling to; to adhere; stubborn; to detain sb as prisoner

拘忌.definition: to have scruples; to have misgivings

拘押.definition: to arrest; to take into custody

拘攣.definition: cramps; muscular spasm; fig. constrained; ill at ease

拘攣兒.definition: erhua variant of 拘攣|拘挛[ju1 luan2]

拘束.definition: to restrict; to restrain; constrained; awkward; ill at ease; uncomfortable; reticent

拘泥.definition: to be a stickler for formalities; to rigidly adhere to; to cling to; constrained; ill at ease

拘留.definition: to detain (a prisoner); to keep sb in custody

拘禁.definition: constraint; to detain; to take into custody
